text:
Good work, Mamimi.
Looks like you really put effort into it.

Well...
It's not like I was pulling pranks 24/7...

Haha, true enough.
You seemed to be really nejoying yourself, playing with Asahi and such.

Well... the training camp was pretty boring at first but
this sort of thing is surprisingly not so bad I guess.

Anyway, Producer,
I got you a present, here.

Oh? This bag?
I wonder what it could be...
It's a newt that Asahi found.

Since Asahi and I both didn't want to keep it
I thought we should give it to you, Producer.

I-I see... thanks... I'll treasure it...... On second thought,
I'm sure it'd be better to return it to nature... Hahaha
